channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nuro closes $203M to propel AI-first self-driving tech, commercial partnerships

item.title: How AI ‘digital minds’ startup Delphi stopped drowning in user data and scaled up with Pinecone
item.description: Delphi envisions millions of Digital Minds active across domains and audiences. Pinecone sees its database as the retrieval layer.

item.title: This is the critical detail that could unravel the AI trade: Nobody is paying for it.

item.title: Oil and gold are sending an important message to stock-market bulls. Here’s how to read it.
